document.full_text: president dmitry medvedev marked the anniversary on monday of victory over nazi germany with a promise to arm russian troops with the latest weapons and push reform of a military plagued by low morale and poor equipment.
document.title: medvedev promises better arms for russian military
lines_and_colors: president dmitry medvedev marked the anniversary on monday of victory over nazi germany with a promise to arm russian troops with the latest weapons and push reform of a military plagued by low morale and poor equipment.
